mapper.update: update userinfo set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uer_psw = #{uerPsw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, integral = #{integral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_login_time = #{endLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, head_portrait = #{headPortrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, uer_psw, sex, phone, LEVEL, integral, email, nickname, start_time, end_login_time, end_time, head_portrait from userinfo where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select user_id, user_name, uer_psw, sex, phone, LEVEL, integral, email, nickname, start_time, end_login_time, end_time, head_portrait from userinfo
